column11: a massage woman was arrested for stealing money.------The suspect
column12: a 32-year-old Cambodian massage therapist was working at 16E0
column16: allegedly stole 1000 Euros in the premises.------The victim
column18: a 53-year-old Libyan said he went to the massage parlor and was told to put his backpack on the bed.------EDIT: Same story in Arey News says the victim was a Lebanese woman of the same name.------ ------A later picture shows a couple.------After the massage ended
